programme.title: Le grand miracle
programme.desc:
(4) U.S. 2012. In small town Alaska, a news reporter recruits his ex-girlfriend - a Greenpeace volunteer - on a campaign to save a family of gray whales trapped by rapidly forming ice in the Arctic Circle.
Réalisation : Ken Kwapis
Avec : John Krasinski Drew Barrymore Kristen Bell

programme.title: Beyond the Field
programme.desc: (S02EP04) COVID-19 affected all aspects of life when it hit in early 2020. Hosts Greg Westlake and Travis Murao talk training and competing in a global pandemic with Danielle Kisser and Dr. Andrew Marshall.

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc: (S04EP02) In this episode of #IGotThis: A new disability. As the after-effects of COVID-19 are studied around the globe, two young men with extreme cases of long COVID are learning the impacts of this unfamiliar journey together.

programme.title: Double Tap TV
programme.desc: (S05EP30) How can a person who is blind review cars? We introduce you to Julio Supercharge, a content creator from Kenya pushing the boundaries by reviewing cars by touch and feel.

programme.title: Mind Your Own Business
programme.desc: (S01EP04) Ryan Benoit runs a clothing brand from a storefront in Sudbury, Ontario. He wants to expand the brand to other parts of the country, but has to navigate his way past a major setback before that happens.

programme.title: Ness Murby - Transcending
programme.desc:
(S01EP04) Ness and Eva are in a rush to get new gear and perform well as they head into the final competition of the season. This is Ness' last chance to fight for his place on the Canadian National Team.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Fashion Dis
programme.desc:
(S01EP02) A single mom, para-athlete, full-time student and an aspiring broadcaster, Claire is a powerful, accomplished woman lost in oversized clothing and a look that doesn't reflect who she really is.
Année : 2022

programme.title: Rendez-vous politique surprise
programme.desc:
(S05EP06) Liberal MP Nathaniel Erskine-Smith and Conservative MP Garnett Genuis re-unite to debate what needs to be done to address the opioid drug crisis in Canada.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Dish With Mary
programme.desc:
(S03EP03) In this episode of Dish with Mary, Mary Mammoliti visits Chef Dan Hayes, The London Chef and co-star of APTN's Moosemeat & Marmalade, in Victoria, B.C. Chef Hayes shares how he got into cooking and why he came to Canada.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
(S03EP05) Chris and Alex get into the spirit of autumn by building an apple press, and swing for the fences with their own custom baseball bats.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:
Jazz singer Emilie-Claire Barlow brings the heat as she teaches Christine and Carl how to make spicy samosas and spiced panna cotta.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
We visit OPVIC Music Camp, an annual event for blind and partialy sighted children in Ontario. Held at W. Ross Macdonald School for the Blind in Brantford, it offers children the chance to engage and interact in an educational and fun environment.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
(S02EP04) Chris and Alex find a huge mess in the workshop and think of a better way to store garbage with a fresh, clean look. Then it's off to help a child care centre build a home for the group's two unusual food disposal systems.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S13EP16) Ogden and Effie try to untangle the death of a hair salon owner that occurred outside Murdoch's jurisdiction.
Année : 2008

programme.title: NOW with Dave Brown
programme.desc:
Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, sports, entertainment and current events through a disability lens.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
In 2007, Donalda Jones started REALM, a non-profit charity to help others benefit from a disability network. Since then, REALM has helped over 40 individuals of all abilities carry out their dreams.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Dish With Mary
programme.desc:
(S03EP03) In this episode of Dish with Mary, Mary Mammoliti visits Chef Dan Hayes, The London Chef and co-star of APTN's Moosemeat & Marmalade, in Victoria, B.C. Chef Hayes shares how he got into cooking and why he came to Canada.
Année : 2008

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S06EP09) Lucas' past comes back to haunt him and others in Hope Valley. Lee and Gowen compete for workers. Meanwhile, an old friend arrives with a new orphan.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc:
(S14EP02) Amy must face a difficult truth when her efforts to help a young girl form a connection with her new horse takes an unexpected turn. Meanwhile, Lou faces harsh criticism as mayor, and a cattle drive brings up difficult memories for Jack.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc:
Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Bienvenue à Schitt's Creek
programme.desc:
(S04EP02) After finding a positive pregnancy test, Johnny braces himself for the possibility of a new baby in the family, while David and Patrick search for some privacy.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Kim's Convenience
programme.desc:
(S03EP12) Umma and Appa accidentally damage a close friend's car. Janet discovers that Gerald isn't as loyal a friend as she thought. Jung worries that his birthday message to Shannon might be too personal.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Level Playing Field
programme.desc:
Greg Westlake hits the court with wheelchair tennis phenom Rob Shaw before meeting the people from SkiAbility Algoma, an organization dedicated to ensuring water skiing is accessible to all.
Année : 2014

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc:

Année : 2014
